drlpm.algos.rllib_algos module#

class drlpm.algos.rllib_algos.RLlibAlgo(algo_name: str)[source]#

Bases: AbstractAlgo

Able to call rllib algos by name. Only works for algos with config setup like RllibPPO below. Note: Further algos will be added – until now, only PPO is supported.

__init__(algo_name: str) → None[source]#

Constructor.

Parameters:

algo_name (str) – Name of the algo

_abc_impl = <_abc_data object>#
get_algo(**kwargs) → Any[source]#

Return the corresponding reinforcement learning algo specified by user.

Parameters:

kwargs (dict) –

env (MultiAgentStockTradingEnv): The Rllib MultiAgentEnv environment for which to create the algo env_config (EnvContext):

data (pd.DataFrame): Data of given stocks – includes OHLC data and indicators and indices stock_symbols (list): List of stock as stock-symbols, e.g. ‘AAPL’ initial_balance (float): Initial account balance agent_ids (list): Names of agents

config (dict): Dictionary of user defined configurations data (pd.DataFrame): Data of given stocks – includes OHLC data and indicators and indices

Returns:

Respective algo – defined by user

Return type:

(Any)

class drlpm.algos.rllib_algos.RllibPPO(env: Any, env_config: EnvContext, config: dict, data: DataFrame)[source]#

Bases: object

PPO for multi agent environment.

__call__() → Any[source]#

Returns PPO algo.

Note: The current version is a template on how to implement an algo for the multi agent environment into this

repository. The agents differ only in random gamma values which does not justify the multi agent environment since hyperparameter tuning could achieve the same. In order to do some serious stuff, use the high customization options of rllib and add a class here.

Returns:

PPO algo with rllib – with defined policies

Return type:

(Any)

__init__(env: Any, env_config: EnvContext, config: dict, data: DataFrame) → None[source]#

Constructor.

Parameters:

  • env (MultiAgentStockTradingEnv) – The Rllib MultiAgentEnv environment for which to create the algo

  • env_config (EnvContext) – data (pd.DataFrame): Data of given stocks – includes OHLC data and indicators and indices stock_symbols (list): List of stock as stock-symbols, e.g. ‘AAPL’ initial_balance (float): Initial account balance agent_ids (list): Names of agents

  • config (dict) – Dictionary of user defined configurations

  • data (pd.DataFrame) – Data of given stocks – includes OHLC data and indicators and indices

static _sample_gamma() → float[source]#

Samples values for gamma.

Returns:

Random number between 0.7 and 1

Return type:

(float)
